Subject: Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

::Magmatron::

    Magmatron sent a probe to find Bobertron, he needed him for his plans. 
Finally he found Bobertron. An image of Magmatron appeared in front of 
Bobertron.
    "Bobertron, give me your ears for just a little while. I know your past 
and I know your proboly heading for Megatron right now. I will know where he 
is if you keep going, and I will tell Hell Beast. Megatron has gone insane, I 
learned this on Cybertron. He wishes to destroy the Ark, so if you help him 
you will kill yourself in the process. And if I'm correct you would have made 
a copy of the Key, I know you well. If you did Megatron already belives that 
you are lying, he will kill you. I have enough weapons up here to supply an 
army. I still wish for you to join me, as second in command. Yes I don't have 
many forces now, but I will hopefully have more. If you join me I will let no 
harm come to Megatron while I am here. Remember Megatron has gone insane."
